formalMetadata.description: Document containing a link; when the user hovers over the link an MP3 file is loaded with an external player.
formalMetadata.title: Change of user agent when a link is hovered over (onmouseover)

purpose.p: The test is intended to fail because the change of user agent was not expected.

functionalOutcome.p: When the user hovers over the link, an audio file starts playing.

techComment.p: The actual behaviour may depend on the user agent. On Windows XP, the following behaviour was observed. In Internet Explorer, the audio file was loaded in an instance of Windows Media Player. In Firefox 2.0 and Seamonkey 1.1, audio file was played by QuickTime (in the same tab as the referencing file). In Opera 9.0, the audio file started playing in the background, with no audio plugin being visible.
This test case maps to failure F22: Failure of SC 3.2.5 due to opening windows that are not requested by the user.
